example.text: I thank former Congressman Rodney Davis, who was the first to introduce this legislation back in 2013, and I thank Congressman Mike Carey for partnering with me to build on this proposal by eliminating age limits and emphasizing pre-apprenticeship eligibility. Mr. Speaker, I urge my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to join us in supporting career pathways and a chance for everyone to succeed in our changing economy.

I thank former Congressman Rodney Davis, who was the first to introduce this legislation back in 2013, and I thank Congressman Mike Carey for partnering with me to build on this proposal by eliminating age limits and emphasizing pre-apprenticeship eligibility. Mr. Speaker, I urge my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to join us in supporting career pathways and a chance for everyone to succeed in our changing economy.
